overview:
Currently the Group Vice President CRM Products at Oracle, George Colliat has been a Venture Partner with Wellington Partners since November 2005, advising the firm’s Technology portfolio on Software and Electronics. French-American George brings to Wellington a strong background in software development as well as product management. Today, he is responsible for the product definition and development of CRM products at Oracle, including Siebel, and the next generation of Fusion CRM products. Before the merger of Oracle and Siebel, George was the Group Vice President (Engineering) at Siebel and took care of their development of Core Engineering for all applications. Prior to joining Siebel, George held executive positions at, among others, Alcatel, Arbor Software Corporation, Bull Information Systems, Constellar Corporation and Gupta Technologies. During his three year tenure at Arbor, the company went through a highly successful IPO in 1995 and captured 2000 customers among Fortune 2000 companies.

George began his career in 1983 at Alcatel, serving as Senior VP of Engineering for six years. George holds a Master’s degree in the US and an Engineering degree in Europe.
